creator: dianne.jiao@sun.com
text:
Filter mapping:

  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>ServletMappedTest_Filter</filter-name>
    <servlet-name>ForwardedServlet</servlet-name>
    <dispatcher>FORWARD</dispatcher>
  </filter-mapping>

Access ForwardedServlet directly, filter gets invoked.

creator: jfarcand@apache.org
text:
The forward mechanism was broken. Please try an let me know.

Thanks,

-- Jeanfrancois
Fix verified in today's cvs build.  Thanks.
